content:
Interesting pivot — from low-tech validation to an AI-built MVP.

Before committing to that path: **What specific assumptions about the platform can only be validated with working software that you couldn't test with a Sheets-based prototype and manual process for your first 5-10 events?**

The risk is building infrastructure before proving people will actually use transparent pricing, submit feedback, or care about governance — things you could test at a single location with zero code.
